categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures books

nodes.text: This is Luke is a Level 1 World of Reading young-readers book that was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on September 8, 2020. The book introduces readers to Luke Skywalker through the original trilogy and feature the illustration style of the Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures animated shorts.

This Level 1 early reader with stickers introduces young fans and reluctant readers to Luke Skywalker, one of the most iconic characters from the Star Wars Saga and features a fun new illustration style from the celebrated Galaxy of Adventures animation shorts (with over 3 million views on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel). Padawans learning to read will love this fresh take on a format parents know and trust.
